kpi.name: LTE_5092c
kpi.formula:
100*decode( (lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_norm + lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_detach + lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_rnl + lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_oth + lepsb.enb_epsbear_rel_req_rnl_redir + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_norm + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_rnl + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_tnl + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_oth + nvl(lepsb.pre_empt_gbr_bearer,0) + nvl(lepsb.pre_empt_non_gbr_bearer,0)),0,null,
lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_oth / (lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_norm + lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_detach + lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_rnl + lepsb.epc_eps_bearer_rel_req_oth + lepsb.enb_epsbear_rel_req_rnl_redir + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_norm + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_rnl + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_tnl + lepsb.enb_eps_bearer_rel_req_oth + nvl(lepsb.pre_empt_gbr_bearer,0) + nvl(lepsb.pre_empt_non_gbr_bearer,0)))

kpi_info.title: E-UTRAN E-RAB drop ratio due to other (OTH) cause initiated by eNB (pre-emptions excluded)
kpi_info.use: This KPI describes the ratio of E-RAB drops (abnormal release) due to "other" cause related to all E-RAB release commands (pre-emptions are excluded).
kpi_info.formula:
100*sum(ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_OTH)/
sum(EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_NORM+EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_DETACH+EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_RNL+ EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_OTH + ENB_EPSBEAR_REL_REQ_RNL_REDIR+ ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_NORM + ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_RNL +ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_TNL + ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_OTH + PRE_EMPT_GBR_BEARER + PRE_EMPT_NON_GBR_BEARER)
